subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Charm's Toybox/B82itsapassportx2.wav 
  Uploaded by : charmedbyu20032003 <charmedbyu20032003@...> 
  Description : 2 voices are heard. they overlap slightly and each say the same thing. I was asking the 'spirits'about death. they claim "its a passport" 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Charm%27s%20Toybox/B82itsapassportx2.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
